title: Pixel 3xl Intermittent Touch Freeze.
content:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/13553491?hl=en&msgid=13553491

This intermittent freeze problem happens constantly.  The app drawer open/close trick works.  If THAT responds, why unresponsive everywhere else?

ALL intermittent problems are difficult.  Please fix.  This problem COSTS TIME.  And, time is MONEY.

Everything is up to date.  Force your engineers to use your devices for all work.  That will expedite a fix.

Please get this fixed, Google/Alphabet/Android.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
